Key Match Events: Australia came from behind to beat China 3-1.
Goals from Lewis Miller, Craig Goodwin, and debutant Nishan Velupillay secured the victory for Australia.
China took the lead in the 20th minute against the run of play.
Pre-Game Insights: Australia went into the game after a shock 1-0 home loss to Bahrain and a scoreless draw in Indonesia, leaving them in a perilous position in Asian Group C.
The match marked Tony Popovic's first game as coach of Australia after the departure of Graham Arnold.
Post-Match Reflections: Socceroos skipper Jackson Irvine praised the team's calm and composed approach, even after conceding the first goal.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in front of 46,291 fans at Adelaide Oval.
